Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the application of provisions of the not-for-profit corporation law and other laws to certain crematoriums located in the town of Tonawanda; repealer
Summary: Relates to the application of provisions of the not-for-profit corporation law and other laws to certain crematoriums located in the town of Tonawanda; provides that provisions will apply to a crematory or crematorium operated by a funeral entity in the town of Tonawanda that has been subject to a consent order issued by the department of environmental conservation.
LawCode: Amd ยง14, rpld ยง14 sub 2, Chap 560 of 1998
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 560 of the laws of 1998 amending the not-for-profit corporation law and other laws, relating to combinations of cemetery corporations and funeral entities, and the sale of monuments and memorials, in relation to the application of provisions of the not-for-profit corporation law and other laws to certain crematoriums located in the town of Tonawanda; and to repeal certain provisions of such chapter relating thereto
